abstract: Stephen Holden reviews movie Daddy's Home directed and co-written by Sean Anders and stars Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg.
lead_paragraph: A contentedly married man’s relationship with his stepchildren comes under siege when the children’s biological father comes back into their lives.

headline.main: Review: ‘Daddy’s Home’ Stars Mark Wahlberg and Will Ferrell, Playing Naughty and Nice
headline.print_headline: In This Family, It’s Naughty vs. Nice

snippet: A contentedly married man’s relationship with his stepchildren comes under siege when the children’s biological father comes back into their lives.
